tmpls.afmt:
<iframe id="analysisBoard"></iframe>


<script>
var PGN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:PGN}}`);
var FEN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:FEN}}`);

document.getElementById("analysisBoard").src =`_ChessTempoViewer.html?PGN=`+PGN+`&FEN=`+FEN+``;

</script>
tmpls.name: Card 1
tmpls.qfmt:
<iframe id="Board"></iframe>



<script>
var FEN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:FEN}}`);
var Title = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:Title}}`);
var Comments = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:Comments}}`);
var PGN = `{{text:PGN}}`.replace(/\[Puzzle_Length.*?\]/, '').replace(/\[Tactic_line.*?\]/, ''); //compatability with chess.com puzzles
var PGN = encodeURIComponent(PGN);

// determine whether to automatically respond or quiz you on the entire line, meaning you play both sides.

var playAllMoves = `false`;
{{#playAllMoves}}
playAllMoves = `true`;
{{/playAllMoves}}

document.getElementById("Board").src =`_board2.html?PGN=`+PGN+`&FEN=`+FEN+`&Comments=`+Comments+`&Title=`+Title+`&playAllMoves=`+playAllMoves+``;
</script>

tmpls.afmt:
<iframe id="analysisBoard"></iframe>


<script>
var PGN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:PGN}}`);
var FEN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:FEN}}`);

document.getElementById("analysisBoard").src =`_ChessTempoViewerB.html?PGN=`+PGN+`&FEN=`+FEN+``;

</script>
tmpls.name: Card 1
tmpls.qfmt:
<iframe id="Board"></iframe>



<script>
var FEN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:FEN}}`);
var Title = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:Title}}`);
var Comments = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:Comments}}`);
var PGN = `{{text:PGN}}`.replace(/\[Puzzle_Length.*?\]/, '').replace(/\[Tactic_line.*?\]/, ''); //compatability with chess.com puzzles
var PGN = encodeURIComponent(PGN);

// determine whether to automatically respond or quiz you on the entire line, meaning you play both sides.

var playAllMoves = `false`;
{{#playAllMoves}}
playAllMoves = `true`;
{{/playAllMoves}}

document.getElementById("Board").src =`_board.html?PGN=`+PGN+`&FEN=`+FEN+`&Comments=`+Comments+`&Title=`+Title+`&playAllMoves=`+playAllMoves+``;
</script>

<script>

  var FEN = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:FEN}}`);
  var Comments = encodeURIComponent(`{{text:Comments}}`);

  


    /* time spent calculating -- value is randomized to result in varying moves */
var thinkTime = 1;

thinkTime = 2;
}

document.getElementById("Board").src =`_BoardVsEngine.html?FEN=`+FEN+`&thinkTime=`+thinkTime+`&Comments=`+Comments+``;



var myPGN;

window.addEventListener('message', event => {

        console.log(event.data);
myPGN=event.data;
    if (Persistence.isAvailable()) {
    Persistence.setItem(myPGN);  //   2. Store that number
}
});







</script>
